actions.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Received in the House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Operations and Services.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Subcommittee on Postal Operations and Services Discharged.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended).

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Mr. McCloskey moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Message on House action received in Senate and held at desk: House amendments to Senate bill.
Senate agreed to the House amendments by Voice Vote.
Cleared for White House.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 102-71.

official_title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office located at 304 West Commercial Avenue in Monterey, Tennessee, as the "J.E. 'Eddie' Russell Post Office".

summary.text: Designates the building in Monterey, Tennessee, which houses the primary operations of the United States Postal Service, as the J.E. (Eddie) Russell Post Office Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office located at 304 West Commercial Avenue in Monterey, Tennessee, as the "J.E. 'Eddie' Russell Post Office".
